Text.Page:
I'll also need...here it is. Goodness, this is quite the list they expect from you. You may want to take notes. Ready?

They want you to kill Lokian {@LinkCreature:19#4000#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:19#4001#rippers}, {@LinkCreature:19#4002#cleavers}, {@LinkCreature:19#4003#gutreavers}, {@LinkCreature:19#4004#swordlords}, {@LinkCreature:19#4005#bloodletters}, {@LinkCreature:19#4006#bloodweavers}, {@LinkCreature:19#4007#eboncallers}, and {@LinkCreature:19#4008#dark mages}.

Whew! Took the wind out of me just to read that! Anyway, talk to Karadus when you're done.
Great work. Take this for your trouble.
Time is ticking away. I'll make sure you're rewarded once you've finished the task at hand.
